forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: and extension to all parts face command

comments.text: i would like a way to control how fast an object faces something for ex: all parts face up with 500
well, when i faces something (eg "all parce face nearest banana"), it does it sinstantly, but when it uses "all parts face up" then it has a delay, i dont know why this happens...
...but this might be useful for your purposes
that's the exact issue we were trying to bypass last night, manual setting of the follow speed would fix it.

thread.latestCommentText: that's the exact issue we were trying to bypass last night, manual setting of the follow speed would fix it.
